mapper.update:
update system_setup
MAIL_HOST = #{mailHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIL_PORT = #{mailPort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAIL_USERNAME = #{mailUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIL_PASSWORD = #{mailPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIL_PROTOCOL = #{mailProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SYSTEM_SETUP_ID = #{systemSetupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update system_setup set MAIL_HOST = #{mailHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIL_PORT = #{mailPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAIL_USERNAME = #{mailUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIL_PASSWORD = #{mailPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIL_PROTOCOL = #{mailProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SYSTEM_SETUP_ID = #{systemSetupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
